name: @dopt/blocks-api-manifest
description: A package to copy and store our blocks external specs from GCP

scripts.dev: echo "@dopt/blocks-api-manifest does not require dev"; exit 0;
scripts.format: echo "@dopt/blocks-api-manifest does not require formatting"; exit 0;
scripts.formatcheck: echo "@dopt/blocks-api-manifest does not require formatcheck"; exit 0;
scripts.lint: echo "@dopt/blocks-api-manifest does not require lint"; exit 0;
scripts.test: echo "@dopt/blocks-api-manifest does not require test"; exit 0;
scripts.typecheck: echo "@dopt/blocks-api-manifest does not require typecheck"; exit 0;
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm -w exec turbo run build --filter="@dopt/blocks-api-manifest"; pnpm test;
